Entries.fall_Sun: I used to live in a tent, moving town to town before I settling down in Stardew Valley
Entries.fall_Thurs6: I find writing in my journal to be an excellent way to relax my mind at night.
Entries.fall_Fri4: Living in a tree is nice, I wake up everyday to the music of the birds.
Entries.Sun: #$1 linusVandal#Someone was throwing rocks at my windows last night... I just had to wait it out.$s$k#I don't like to stay in one place for too long. There's just too much to experience in the world.
Entries.winter_Mon: It can get really cold if you live in a tree.
Entries.winter_Wed: I think I'd prefer to be left alone today if you don't mind.
Entries.winter_Sun: I slept on the floor in a sleeping bag as a young man, but now my back is too sore for that.
Entries.winter_Sat2: I have to stock up during the year to have enough food for these months.
